Txt_Talk_PortogaLight_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_011.Text: *: Why, hello there! Feels like we were destined to meet, you and I. Two weary wanderers guided by the Goddess's hand.
*: I'm a seafarin' bard as it happens. Mind if I sing you a song?

*: ♪ O'er the salt our keels soar fillin' our sails and hearts.
We'll be tradin' the deck for land we suspect.
To be missin' from all the realm's charts. ♪

*: ♪ An isle you're nearin', a land o' sneerin', bedecked with gown and frown.
North o' its shoals, find some goals and a king with a calcium crown. ♪

*: ♪ An isle home to tundra and a fair share of wonder.
Float south of its shore to find ice floes of yore.
See and delight as it appears in dusk-light. ♪

*: ♪ Oh, the horizon calls us with her siren's song...
New pals just waitin' to be taken along!
Firm friends we'll be before very long! ♪
*: Thanks for listenin', traveller. May the seas treat you kindly.

Txt_Talk_PortogaLight_3F_SUB_0_ACTOR_011.Text: *: When you sail the seas as much as I do, you come across everything from driftwood to bits of old cargo.
*: Not all the cargo's ancient, mind. Sometimes you find an object so new it was likely dumped by a ship fleeing a monster.

*: And, every now and then, you hit the jackpot and find a shipwreck with some bona fide treasure! Does put the fear of the Goddess in me, though<--->can't help but wonder if someday my ship'll meet the same fate too...

Txt_Talk_PortogaLight_4F_SUB_0_ACTOR_011.Text: *: Let me tell ya, that there sea's full o' mysteries, so she is. Like the strait where they say a woman's song stops ships dead in their bleedin' tracks.
*: And then there's that ghost ship doomed to drift across the waters for as long as the world spins...
*: I'd love to look into all this nonsense, but our captain's lily-livered as they come, so we always steer clear o' all the fun.
*: Ahh, but if I were a pirate, and 'ow I wish I were, I'd sail all over the globe and make it me oyster!
*: You know, there's a pirate den somewhere on the continent to the west. Maybe I'll make me way over there one day to see if I can join 'em!

Txt_Talk_PortogaLight_4F_SUB_0_ACTOR_021.Text: *: Legends tell of six orbs that reside in our world.
*: If someone were to get all six, they would be imbued with great power. At least, that's what they say, anyway.

Txt_Talk_PortogaLight_4F_SUB_0_ACTOR_031.Text: *: If you follow the coast and sail south from here, eventually you'll reach the Wayfarer's Shrine.
*: Then, if you make your way south-east from there, you'll come upon an estuary. Follow the river in your ship and eventually you'll get to the village of Theddon.
*: I did hear that it got set upon by monsters, though. Something to keep in mind anyway if you decide to head south.

Txt_Talk_PortogaLight_4F_SearchObj_Light.Text: It's the flame that lights the lighthouse.
